item.title: Record and share terminal session using Terminalizer
item.description: There are great open-source tools are available to record screen. I personally like loom and google hangout. All of these are good. But I recently came across Terminalizer to record the terminal session. It is easy to set up and use. Here in this session, I will quickly demo how I use this tool for document creation and sharing.
